* '''Slight decrease in overall smoking (2017: 31.8% / 2018: 32%)''''
** decrease in daily smoking (2017: 26.9% / 2018: 25.4%)
** increase in occasional smoking (2017: 4.9% / 2018: 6.6%)

question.question: What was the trend in smoking prevalence in France between 2017 and 2018?
question.option_a: A decrease in daily smoking from 26.9% to 25.4%
question.option_b: A slight decrease in overall smoking from 31.8% to 32%
question.option_c: An increase in occasional smoking from 4.9% to 6.6%
question.option_d: A decrease in occasional smoking from 6.6% to 4.9%
